name: Dream Job (Francisco Costa)
description:
This Game was made for the Globalgamejam 2022 @ Tecnico/Belas-Artes
https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/dream-job-8

Oh, how you wish you could be living an adventure, full of action and thrill. But instead, you are stuck at your boring office job, doing uneventful tasks for your uptight boss. And it's getting harder and harder not to snooze. In Dream Job you alternate between your slow-paced daytime office job and your action-packed dreams. Office Job Gameplay: Play a memory game, trying to match pairs. Don't match too many wrong pairs, and don't let the timer run out! Spend too long without making a move and you will fall asleep, going into your Dream World. Dream World Gameplay: Fight hordes of monsters that will get progressively harder, while searching for clues for your office job. Try not to get killed! Monster will drop power ups that will grant you upgrades. Kill too many enemies and you will get excited, waking up. Change between both worlds and solve your job Have fun!
